entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
